fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Legalize something, giving every living player, including you, a one time use ability determined by the host depending on what you legalized.
-Make something illegal, removing any abilities that would be affected by the new law, determined by the host (example: Guns are illegal, so a vigilante canâ€™t shoot people)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You are not negatively or positively affected by your laws if targeted by another player
-You cannot make day actions illegal
-You may choose another role to disguise yourself as for the game
-With the necronomicon, you may make day actions illegal, and any ability you get from your first ability become permanent
